00023 #ifndef CIBERNATECONNECTIONPOOL_H_
00024 #define CIBERNATECONNECTIONPOOL_H_
00025 #include <sqltypes.h>
00026 #include <sql.h>
00027 #include <sqlext.h>
00028 #include "vector"
00029 #include "string"
00030 #include "math.h"
00031 #include <stdio.h>
00032 #include <stdlib.h>
00033 #include "Timer.h"
00034 using namespace std;
00035 
00036 class Connection
00037 {
00038 public:
00039         bool busy;
00040         bool type;
00041         SQLHDBC conn;
00042         ~Connection()
00043         {
00044                 SQLDisconnect(conn);
00045                 SQLFreeHandle(SQL_HANDLE_DBC,conn);
00046                 cout << "\nDestructed Connection" << flush;
00047         }
00048 };
00049 typedef vector<Connection*> connVec;
00050 class CibernateConnectionPool {
00051         int readNumber;
00052         string dbName,uname,pass;
00053         SQLHENV V_OD_Env;// Handle ODBC environment
00054         connVec readConnections;
00055         connVec writeConnections;
00056         void newConnection(bool);
00057         void createPool(int,string,string,string);
00058 public:
00059         CibernateConnectionPool(int,string,string,string);
00060         virtual ~CibernateConnectionPool();
00061         //static CibernateConnectionPool* getInstance();
00062         Connection* getReadConnection();
00063         Connection* getWriteConnection();
00064         void closeConnection(Connection*);
00065         bool initialized;
00066 };
00067 
00068 #endif /* CIBERNATECONNECTIONPOOL_H_ */
